data.text:
@LCPSOfficial https://t.co/iHJbPo2HZq

Body cameras for every teacher. If it saves just one student.
@LCPSOfficial Oh naahhh we’re gonna die lmfao😭😭

@LCPSOfficial “We ask that members of our school community support and respect the choices our students and staff make regarding mask-wearing.”

If this had been your position earlier, Youngkin wouldn’t have had to issue an Exec order, pass a law and win a court case. Trust and goodwill lost.
@LCPSOfficial Move along, nothing to see here.
